Functions

uint32_t am_hal_engmon_monitor_config (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor, am_hal_engmon_monitor_config_e eConfig)
 Configure an energy monitor.
 
uint32_t am_hal_engmon_monitor_config_read (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor, uint32_t *pui32Config)
 Read the configuration of an energy monitor.
 
uint32_t am_hal_powerctrl_monitor_read (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor, uint32_t *ui32Count)
 Read the count value of the energy monitor.
 
uint32_t am_hal_powerctrl_monitor_reset (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor)
 Reset an energy monitor count back to zero.
 
uint32_t am_hal_powerctrl_monitor_stop (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor)
 Stop an energy monitor counter, preserving the current count.
 
uint32_t am_hal_powerctrl_monitor_start (am_hal_engmon_monitor_select_e eMonitor)
 Start an energy monitor counter.
